WhatsApp per iOS dovrebbe riprodurre direttamente i trailer di Netflix, ci riuscite? (foto)

text:
WhatsApp for iOS should play Netflix trailers directly, can you do it? (photo)
01 Nov 2019, 17:35 by Matteo Bottin
One of the WhatsApp features allows you to play videos from specific sources (such as YouTube) within the app itself. This feature is already available on iOS, Android and desktops, but is limited to a handful of sources. On iOS, another source is added to these sources: Netflix.
As experienced by WABetaInfo, sharing a Netflix compatible link on WhatsApp generates an extended preview. Tapping on this preview, the video plays without having to open the Netflix app.
As mentioned at the beginning of the article, this news is only available on iOS. To try it you will need to have the latest version available. To date, therefore, the services compatible with this feature of WhatsApp are Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Streamable and Netflix.
It seems, however, that the function is being rolled out: we tried with our updated iOS device and it doesn't seem to work. Are you luckier?



2 ðŸ“· go to the photo gallery
